141925.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「ここは エテー:
This is Ethene Village. We, the people of Ethene, live quietly on this island in the center of the world. Thanks to the blessings
of Galapagod, our days are quiet and peaceful, but outside the village, things are different. Recently, the monsters have become so
ferocious that they sometimes attack you just by walking outside. If your level improves, they will be less likely to attack you, so
don't push yourself too hard. When your HP is low, go back to your house and rest. Your HP and MP will be restored to full! And then...You can dash by holding down the ''+'' key while moving. This is useful when you need to hurry. It is easy to move away from approaching
monsters, but if you keep avoiding monsters, you may find yourself surrounded by strong enemies! This can be a problem. Avoid monsters
in moderation.

for a long time, but today, as usual, I'm still asleep. But I'd like to see Galapagod moving, even if it's just in my dreams.

141927.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「どくけし茶は:

141972.<attr><feel_angry_one><end_attr>「よし 教えてや:
Okay, let me tell you something! When you run into a monster outside, a battle begins with that monster! When you get into a battle, a
command opens! You may be in a hurry, but time stands still when you select a command. You must be calm and choose the command that is
open at the time. There are two types of commands: Main Command and Misc. Command. You can switch between them with the buttons! The
Main Command is for individual actions, and the Misc. Command is for party instructions. If you feel that the enemy is stronger than
you, just run away from the enemy! Choose the Misc. Command ''Escape''! However, there are times in life when you can't escape from a
battle! You must always be on your guard!

141973.<attr><feel_angry_one><end_attr>「では 聞きたく:

142021.<attr><feel_angry_lv3><end_attr>「魔物が 村に入:
